author: frangio_
content: is there any way to get the creator contract to compile with solc (develop branch)? cc <@907931206081990666> <@275684146658148352>

author: frangio_
content: it would be nice to have the compiled output / bytecode so we can confirm it's optimized before frozen

author: frangio_
content: trying with `solc --strict-assembly --experimental-eof-version 1 --evm-version osaka --asm --ir-optimized` but it errors out apparently because of the verbatim

author: _shemnon
content: We are discussing inside Ipsilon if we should be hand-building the creator contract in the spec and providing annotated bytecode instead of compiling.  partly because it will remove a circular layer dependency.

author: frangio_
content: yeah this makes total sense to me
